documentation.text:
Releases outstanding rewards balances to the user
@param _user the address of the user for which the reward tokens will be released
Reapplies the boost of the user, useful if a whale's vMIMO has decreased but their boost is still the original value

Updates the internal state variables based on user's veMIMO hodlings
@param _user the address of the user
Updates the internal state variables after accounting for newly received MIMO and PAR reward tokens

Returns the number of tokens a user can claim via `releaseMIMO`
@return number of MIMO tokens that the user can claim

Returns the number of PAR tokens the user has earned as a reward
@return number of PAR tokens that will be sent automatically when staking/unstaking

attributes.text:
Releases outstanding rewards balances to the user
@param _user the address of the user for which the reward tokens will be released
Reapplies the boost of the user, useful if a whale's vMIMO has decreased but their boost is still the original value

Updates the internal state variables based on user's veMIMO hodlings
@param _user the address of the user
Updates the internal state variables after accounting for newly received MIMO and PAR reward tokens

Returns the number of tokens a user can claim via `releaseMIMO`
@return number of MIMO tokens that the user can claim

Returns the number of PAR tokens the user has earned as a reward
@return number of PAR tokens that will be sent automatically when staking/unstaking

returns._0: number of MIMO tokens that the user can claim
number of PAR tokens that will be sent automatically when staking/unstaking

params._user: the address of the user for which the reward tokens will be released

setBoostConfig((uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: can only be called by protocol manager

params.newBoostConfig: contains all boost multiplier parameters, see {IGenericMinerV2 - BoostConfig}

returns._0: number of staked tokens with boost
`struct UserInfo { uint256 stake; uint256 stakeWithBoost; uint256 accAmountPerShare; uint256 accParAmountPerShare; }`*

pendingMIMO(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user can claim via `releaseMIMO`

pendingPAR(address).notice: Returns the number of PAR tokens the user has earned as a reward

releaseRewards(address).notice: Releases outstanding rewards balances to the user

stake(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user has staked

stakeWithBoost(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user has staked with the boost

updateBoost(address).notice: Reapplies the boost of the user, useful if a whale's vMIMO has decreased but their boost is still the original value

userInfo(address).notice: Returns the userInfo stored of a user
